methods.name: postProcess
methods.justification: Loads and instantiates RBNFPostProcessor reflectively, points-to analysis assumes all classes configured for reflective access.

methods.name: getLenientScannerProvider
methods.justification: Loads and instantiates RbnfLenientScannerProvider reflectively, points-to analysis assumes all classes configured for reflective access.

methods.name: addBundleBaseNamesFromClassLoader
methods.justification: Loads resources using class loader, dynamic classloading is not supported by SVM.

methods.name: load
methods.justification: Loads and instantiates ResourceBundle reflectively, points-to analysis assumes all classes configured for reflective access.

methods.name: getShim
methods.justification: Loads and instantiates NumberFormatShim reflectively, points-to analysis assumes all classes configured for reflective access.

methods.name: getShim
methods.justification: Loads and instantiates BreakIteratorServiceShim reflectively, points-to analysis assumes all classes configured for reflective access.

methods.name: getShim
methods.justification: Loads and instantiates ServiceShim reflectively, points-to analysis assumes all classes configured for reflective access.

methods.name: <init>
methods.justification: Creates a new dummy ClassLoader to represent a null ClassLoader, classloading is not supported by SVM.

name: org.graalvm.shadowed.com.ibm.icu.impl.ICUData
justification: Loads resources using class loader, classloading is not supported by SVM.

methods.name: mapFile
methods.justification: In runtime unused, JavaScript loads data from resources instead of files.

methods.name: get
methods.justification: Reads system property for ICU library.

name: org.graalvm.shadowed.com.ibm.icu.impl.URLHandler$JarURLHandler
justification: Unreachable in runtime but called in PrivilegedAction which makes it visible in context insensitive points-to-analyses.

name: org.graalvm.shadowed.com.ibm.icu.impl.URLHandler$FileURLHandler
justification: Unreachable in runtime but called in PrivilegedAction which makes it visible in context insensitive points-to-analyses.

methods.name: toStringBare
methods.justification: Uses reflection to read the object's field values. Used by DecimalFormatProperties.toString() which is never actually called.

methods.name: debugString
methods.justification: Uses reflection to read the object's field values. Used by CurrencyMetaInfo.*.toString() which is never actually called.
